name: Alien Spooky Run
description:
Hello everyone! This is my first game submitted on itch.io.
"Alien Spooky Run" has been developed in about 48 hours to celebrate Halloween, using Unity and many free assets found on the web. The idea was to create something fun in short time, using the leaderboard to make the players compete in a game easy to play. Then it'd be nice to evolve the game with players' ideas and suggestions.
The game is currently available on Google Play, this is the short store description:

"Collect pumpkins and dodge spooky enemies to become the best in the leaderboard!

Alien Spooky Run is a fast-paced runner game where you'll control a cute alien in a spooky land. Your goal is to collect as many juicy pumpkins as possible while avoiding scarying enemies. 

Compete with the best players in the world with a global leaderboard."

Please try the game and contact me also directly for feedback and ideas, let's introduce new enemies, boosts and game modes!
